Good! Now we have compilation errors related to missing dependencies. The issue is that Spring Cloud OpenFeign and HttpClient dependencies have changed in Spring Boot 3. Let me check what dependencies are needed:

The code is using Apache HttpClient and Spring Cloud Commons classes that don't exist or have changed in Spring Boot 3. In Spring Boot 3, the Spring Cloud dependencies need to be explicitly added. Let me add the necessary dependencies:

#!/usr/bin/env python3
import re

file_path = '/tmp/workdir/search_strands_20260128/tosan-camunda-client-spring-boot-starter/tosan-camunda-client-spring-boot-starter/src/main/java/com/tosan/camunda/camundaclient/CamundaServiceConfig.java'

with open(file_path, 'r') as f:
    lines = f.readlines()

# Process lines
new_lines = []
i = 0
while i < len(lines):
    line = lines[i]
    
    # Skip removed import lines
    if 'import com.tosan.client.http.core.HttpClientProperties;' in line or \
       'import com.tosan.client.http.starter.impl.feign.CustomErrorDecoder;' in line:
        i += 1
        continue
    
    # Add new import
    if 'import java.util.List;' in line:
        new_lines.append('import java.util.Collections;\n')
        i += 1
        continue
        
    # Replace parameter types in method signatures
    if '@Qualifier("camunda-client-clientConfig") HttpClientProperties camundaFeignConfig' in line:
        line = line.replace('@Qualifier("camunda-client-clientConfig") HttpClientProperties camundaFeignConfig',
                          'CamundaClientConfig camundaClientConfig')
    
    if '@Qualifier("camunda-client-requestInterceptor") List<RequestInterceptor> requestInterceptors' in line:
        line = line.replace('@Qualifier("camunda-client-requestInterceptor") List<RequestInterceptor> requestInterceptors',
                          '@Qualifier("camunda-client-requestInterceptor") RequestInterceptor requestInterceptor')
    
    # Remove error decoder parameter line
    if '@Qualifier("camunda-client-feignErrorDecoder") CustomErrorDecoder errorDecoder)' in line:
        # Replace the closing with just )
        line = line.replace('@Qualifier("camunda-client-feignLoggerLevel") Logger.Level logLevel,',
                          '@Qualifier("camunda-client-feignLoggerLevel") Logger.Level logLevel)')
        # Skip the next line which has the error decoder
        new_lines.append(line)
        i += 2  # Skip next line
        continue
    
    # Replace method invocations
    line = line.replace('camundaFeignConfig.getBaseServiceUrl()', 'camundaClientConfig.getBaseUrl()')
    line = line.replace('requestInterceptors, feignContract, feignDecoder, feignEncoder, retryer, logLevel, errorDecoder',
                       'Collections.singletonList(requestInterceptor), feignContract, feignDecoder, feignEncoder, retryer, logLevel, null')
    
    new_lines.append(line)
    i += 1

with open(file_path, 'w') as f:
    f.writelines(new_lines)

print("Fixed CamundaServiceConfig.java")
ENDOFSCRIPT
